txt.en:
'Let us end this nonsense now! I have had enough of Harding's mistrust of you, [placeholder], when you have given us everything.

'Come, I will insist that a council be called. Go to the Mead Hall, and I will meet you there. If Harding permits this council, the guard will see you in.

'It is time to set things right!'
'You have helped make Harwick's surrounding territory safer for its people. For that, you have my thanks. I think Harwick will be able to hold its own for now.'
'Come with me, [placeholder]. No one will dare arrest you if I am by your side. I will request an audience with Harding immediately.'

In your last visit with Harding, he was not sure he could trust you, and was frustrated at the timing of your meeting. Since then you have done a service to Harwick and should have a more favourable meeting this time around.
Meet CÃ­llan at the Mead Hall for an audience with Harding

Captain Agelmund is eager to take you for another meeting with the Thane of Harwick, Reeve of the Wold and Aldor of the Eastemnet.\n\nYou should speak with Captain Agelmund to travel to Harwick for a meeting with Harding.
Harding has called a meeting in the Mead Hall of Harwick, and awaits your arrival.
